p.text: In Section Window you create the graphic design of your program, having to window Various objects (buttons, text fields, table)

textAll.p: All can arbitrarily move, put forward, resize, create arrays , etc.
windows in the program can be any number, each of them for convenience will be located in a separate tab.

Some objects (memory cell, a stopwatch, the press box) will be placed not at the window, and on the panels below. It is not graphic, but software objects . Such objects are not visible at runtime, they are provided to you for support operations (such as data storage, calculation of time, print)
